name: Pacar
overview: Welcome to the Pacific Car Derby, or PACAR for short! Unlike other car battle derbies that focus mainly on demolition, this race is all about outwitting your opponents, as you must drive your car in a closed road maze and collect fuel pellets to earn points! The derby organizers have hired kamikaze drivers who patrol the road maze and crash into any contender's car without hesitation. It's now your turn to enter the road maze with your car! How long can you last?
